titles.title: I Know Whom I Have Believed

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7 v8 v9 v10

verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I know whom I have believed. And am persuaded that You are able To keep that which I’ve committed Unto You until that day.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I know not how Your saving life To me you did impart, Nor how by calling on your name You flow out from my heart; but . . .{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I know whom I have believed. And am persuaded that You are able To keep that which I’ve committed Unto You until that day.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I know not how Your Spirit moves, Dispensing life to me, Nor how by just beholding You, Conformed to You I’ll be; still . . .{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I know whom I have believed. And am persuaded that You are able To keep that which I’ve committed Unto You until that day.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
v8
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I know whom I have believed. And am persuaded that You are able To keep that which I’ve committed Unto You until that day.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v9
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I know one day, my Lord, You’ll come To make this earth Your own, And we’ll with You forever reign As kings upon Your throne; for we 10. Know whom we have believed. And am persuaded that You are able To keep that which I’ve committed Unto You until that day.{/lang-eng}
